name: Color Blocks - Matching Puzzle
description:
Be challenged each level to get coins and unlock more skins. Above all things, make sure to relax!

We made this game for everyone as the perfect time killer.

Features:
• Simple One-Touch Gameplay
• 30+ Levels
• Infinite Mode
• 12 different skins to unlock
• Simple & soothing artwork


How to Play:

• Swipe any direction on the screen to move and rotate the incoming blocks
• Release finger to let the block fall
• Match 3 blocks of the same color to eliminate them
